Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lys-49 phospholipase A2 (PLA2), myotoxin II (antimicrobial protein; isoform, natural AMPs; snake, reptiles; animals; S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Páramo L, Lomonte B, Pizarro-Cerdá J, Bengoechea JA, Gorvel JP, Moreno E.1998
Literature.Title: Bactericidal activity of Lys49 and Asp49 myotoxic phospholipases A2 from Bothrops asper snake venom--synthetic Lys49 myotoxin II-(115-129)-peptide identifies its bactericidal region

Sequence Information.Comments: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (36.7% similarity)human sPLA2-IIA.  Mol. Wt:   13715.074; GRAVY=-0.663.Activity: Active against S. aureus, V. cholerae and E. coli. No MIC found.Structure:You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB. 5/2016; 7/2021
